en.no_text_key: ❌ The text corresponding to key {key} is not found, contact the developer!
en.no_use_interface:
❌ While in the dungeon, use the dungeon interface!

If an error has occurred and you have exited the dungeon, write /check_dinos
en.no_account: You do not have a registered account in the bot, please go to the bot and register to get access to this command.
en.add_me: ❤ | Everyone can send a request to friends 🌀{username} by clicking on the button below!
en.in_development: This feature is under development, follow the news in order to find out when the team will work!

start_command.first_message: 🎋 | Hey {username}, glad to welcome you!A small tamagotchi-type game bot, only with dinosaurs!🦖 🥚 | What is a tamagotchi? Ptamagochi is a game with a virtual pet that needs to be fed, cared for, played, and so on. 🗻 | What kind of bot? In this bot you have to take care of your pet, travel, conquer the dungeon and completely immerse yourself in this RPG world! 🎮 | How to start playing? Press the button 🍡 Start playing! ❤ | Be ready to pay attention to your dinosaur, have a good game!

request_subscribe.text:
📜 | Dear user!

🎭 | The bot has an official telegram channel and a group, go to the group to find a topic for conversation or ask questions, as well as subscribe to the channel to receive interesting bonuses and news!

❤ | This is not necessary, but we will be very grateful to you!

Wait a bit, an image will be generated now...

start_command.start_game:
🥚 | Choose an egg with a dinosaur!

🦖 | Regardless of which egg you choose, you will get a cute dinosaur.

end_answer.send_text:
🧸 | Congratulations, you have your first dinosaur!

🎇 | At the moment, the egg is incubating, and in 10 minutes a dinosaur will hatch out of it!

🎮 | To view up-to-date information about the egg, click the `🦖 Dinosaur` button!

🧨 | While you are waiting, study the interface, read the FAQ, configure the bot for yourself!

help_command.all: 🎨 | Help Are you so pathetic that you're asking me for help?) Pfff... Well okay. /help - A plea for help from a higher mind. /start - Start the bot / main menu /profile - Open the user profile. /add_me - Send a message with an active add to friends button. (group only) /promo (code) - Enter a promo code. /message_update - Update the dungeon message.
help_command.dev:
/stats - statistics for the bot.

/add_item item_id col user_id - add an item to the user.

/dungeon_delete - delete your dungeon.

/stats_100 - set charracteristics to all your dinosaurs by 100.

/link_promo (code) - link a button with a promo code to a message from the channel. (a response to the message is required)

/unlink_promo - remove the button (a response to the message is required)

/create_promo col | inf time | inf money - create a promo code./copy_m - Send the message to all the users of the bot.

additem_command.err:
Input format:
id of the item
number
id of the user
additem_command.user: 💎 | Yo, the system was generous and gave you {item}

create_promo.format:
Input format:
Number of uses: number / inf
Time: 1m / 2h / 3d / inf
Coins: Number
create_promo.enter_items: Enter items separated by a space or "-"

lang_set.interaction: ❗ Interaction with the language setting, select the language >

project_reb.text:
A man in a black robe approaches you.

You can see that the man has black hair and some kind of scar on his cheek, but his eyes are not visible in the shadow of the hat.

*Personality:* - Hello, my name is {random1} {random2}, and you...

*You are:* - ... {first_name}, {first_name} {last_name}, that's my name

*Personality:* - Fine {first_name}, how long have you been in our business? _smiling_

*You are:* - ...What? Business? What are you talking about?!

*Personality:* - I see, I see... So we'll write it down. _ Writes something in notepad_

*You are:* - ...

*Personality:* - Let's get down to business, we offer you to sign a contract with us, we get your coins and resources, you get an egg with a dinosaur.

*You:* - I know, I don't know...

*You:* - 

❓ | Choose the answer option
buttons: 🧩 | I don't have a choice, right?

faq.text: 🍿 | Hey, our bot is quite big, and there is a lot of information. Here are a couple of categories for you, choose what information you want to get >

not_set.info: ❗ Interaction with notification settings, select notification activity >

en.command_dino_prof: 🥚 | You don't have any dinosaurs at the moment, please check your inventory. You must have an egg in your inventory that you can incubate!
en.settings_faq: ❗ Interaction with the FAQ visibility setting, select visibility >

profile_view.info:
🦕 Select the type of display of the panel in the profile of a dinosaur:
At the moment: {now}

add_friend.info:
➡ | Forward me any message from the person (in the privacy section > message forwarding - there must be permission) with whom you want to become friends or send me his id (you can find out in your bot profile).
Important! Your friend must be registered in the bot!
add_friend.me: ❌ I think you don't have too few friends to try to make friends with yourself.
add_friend.already: 📜 | This user is already a friend / has received a request from you!

friends.delete_info: ➖ | Select the user to remove from friends >
friends.delete: 👥 | The user has been removed from friends!

new_year.send: 🎁 | Hey {name}, your friend {friend} sent you a gift!
new_year.no_send: 🎁 | This user has already received a preliminary gift!

rayting.info: 👁‍🗨 | What rating are you interested in?

open_dino_tavern.info:
🍺 You have entered the dino-tavern!

📜 While staying in the tavern, you can get a quest or hear useful information!
open_dino_tavern.friends: 🍺 Friends in the tavern: Search among the crowd...

rename_dino.err_more: 🦖 | The new name is more than 20 characters!

dino_sleep_ac.d_want: 🌙 The dinosaur doesn't want to sleep!
dino_sleep_ac.sleep: 🌙 You put the dinosaur to sleep!
dino_sleep_ac.choice: 🌙 | Choose the type of sleep for the dinosaur >
dino_sleep_ac.err_time: ❌ | It was required to specify the time in minutes more than 5 minutes and less than 8 hours (480)!
dino_sleep_ac.choice_time: 🌙 | Specify the REM sleep time (sleep is 2 times faster than long sleep) in minutes >
dino_sleep_ac.alredy_busy: ❗ |Your dinosaur is already busy with something, check the profile!

dino_unsleep_ac.awaked_mood:
🌙 Your dinosaur has awakened. He is very unhappy that you woke him up!
Dinosaur lost {r_n}% of mood.

heal.1: *┌* Cough, cough, I don't feel well...

ret_words: Yes, I want to do it
